scripts.db:pull: cd apps/backend && npm exec supabase db pull
scripts.db:push: cd apps/backend && npm exec supabase db push
scripts.db:diff: cd apps/backend && npm exec supabase db diff
scripts.db:reset: cd apps/backend && npm exec supabase db reset
scripts.db:status: cd apps/backend && npm exec supabase status
scripts.gen:types: supabase gen types typescript --project-id oqmllypaarqvabuvbqga --schema public,auth,storage > apps/frontend/src/types/database.types.ts
scripts.health: curl -f http://localhost:3000 && echo '✅ Frontend OK' || echo '❌ Frontend KO'
scripts.health:backend: curl -f http://localhost:3001/health && echo '✅ Backend OK' || echo '❌ Backend KO'
scripts.health:full: npm run health && npm run health:backend
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && cd apps/frontend && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: npm run build:packages && cd apps/backend && npm run build
scripts.reset:hard: npm run cleanup && npm run recovery
scripts.sync:from-cloud: npm run db:pull && npm run gen:types
scripts.sync:full: npm run db:pull && npm run gen:types && npm run typecheck
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run validate:env && npm run test:supabase
